meanings.sent1: The biennales event is a special occurrence that happens once every two years.

meanings.sent4: The biennales rhythm of nature's cycles reminds us of the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The biennales pattern of the seasons brings a sense of predictability to our lives.

meanings.definition: Biennales: a large art exhibition held every two years
meanings.sent1: The biennales showcased a diverse collection of artworks from around the world.
